technology.title: Grand Theft Auto VI is Now Set to Launch November 19, 2026 - Rockstar Games
technology.description:
Hi everyone,

Grand Theft Auto VI will now release on Thursday, November 19, 2026. We are sorry for adding additional time to what we realize has been a long wait, but these extra months will allow us to finish the game with the level of polish you...
